attributes.action: Build an open play area for children in Shiremoor North Tyneside
attributes.additional_details: We are hoping to rally the local council/government to build a play area similar to the park in nearby West Allotment which has access 24 hrs a day to keep children and families occupied.
attributes.background: The only other existing play area (adventure playground) closes at 4pm during school holidays leaving the children of Shiremoor no where to play. Children have been congregating in other areas such as the metro station and school field areas where some disorder has been reported.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
